charges.charge_description: 18 USC ยง 2119 MOTOR VEHICLE THEFT - CARJACKING(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Term of incarceration to be served consecutively; 5 Years Supervised Release, Mandatory and Standard conditions imposed, $200 Special Assessment, To Obtain GED, To Participate in 500 hour drug program, Drug Screening and Counseling as determined by USPO upon release.
